name: Davis Investigations
tag_list: private-investigations, surveillance, private-eye, private-detective, detective, video-surveillance, background-searches, background-check, skip-trace, pi, new-york, ny, ct, connecticut
overview:
Davis Investigations, Inc. is a NY/CT based private investigations agency entirely devoted to obtaining high quality video surveillance for use in medical malpractice, personal injury, insurance fraud, and matrimonial cases.

Davis Investigations, Inc. specializes exclusively in video surveillance. Our goal is to save our clients a million dollars on every video surveillance. We obtain high quality video evidence to expose insurance fraud or cheating spouses.

In cheating spouse cases, Davis Investigations provides piece of mind or confirms doubts to those who suspect their wife or husband of cheating with video surveillance. If the doubts are confirmed, Davis provides clients with video evidence as leverage to negotiate their divorce settlements favorably against their cheating spouse.

Further, Davis Investigations exposes fraudulent plaintiffs and claimants of medical malpractice and personal injury fraud providing attorneys and insurance carriers with video evidence used to initiate settlement negotiations, limit unreasonable plaintiff demands and win defense verdicts.
